definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to pit oneself against sb/to compete with sb/contest/battle/to haggle/to quibble

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列线图的制作为估算瘦肉量提供了更简便的方法。

sentences.english: The critical question is one of scale and degree, " said Nutt, the chairman of the government's Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
sentences.chinese: 关键问题是如何掌握好它的度和量。

sentences.english: Tanggu(Tianjing)is the area of the greatest land subsidence in China nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 天津塘沽区是我国目前年沉降量最大的地区。

sentences.english: They define an "excellent paper" as one that is highly cited by other researchers.
sentences.chinese: 他们把“优秀论文”定义为引用量高的文章。

sentences.english: The shrinkage of the base decreases by the proper dosage water reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 适宜用量的减水剂降低了基层材料的收缩量。

sentences.english: The amount of pesticides present as residues on food is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 食品上的农药残余量总量其实是很少的。

sentences.english: The percentage of soil moisture content and surface residual coverage jointly influence the quantity of wind erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水率和地表残茬覆盖共同影响着土壤的风蚀量。

sentences.english: Spotify offers a number of subscriptions.
We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天摄入的脂肪量最好不要超过65克。

sentences.english: Neil: There's also the world's largest collection of TVs.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有世界收藏量最广最大的各种电视机。

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的总体沉降量仍然随桩长增加而线性减小。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海带摄取的营养物质和海带多糖的量极少。

sentences.english: Maximal oxygen uptake and minute ventilation did not change in either group.
sentences.chinese: 最大耗氧量和每分钟通气量，两组均未发生显著改变。

sentences.english: Intraenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允许口服液体补充静脉体液量。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor qunosity products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 于是多量浙江一带产的劣质产品起初进入市场。

sentences.english: Shows how to reduce the amount of data returned through a data service query.
sentences.chinese: 说明如何减少资料服务查询所传回的资料量。
